targets.rawSql: SELECT TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000) AS "From"
SELECT TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) AS "To"

SELECT * 
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = $endpoint_id 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at) 
ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT (${__to} - ${__from})/1000

SELECT 
  TWait1 AS "Drawer Sampling",
  TWait2 AS "Valves Maintenance",
  TWait3 AS "Hydraulic Oil Unit Maintenance",
  TWait4 AS "Hydraulic Oil Plant Maintenance",
  TWait5 AS "Blower Maintenance",
  TWait6 AS "Skip Maintenance",
  TWait7 AS "Weighed Hopper Calibration",
  TWait8 AS "Coal Weighed Tank Calibration",
  TWait9 AS "Other Maintenance"
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT 
  TOff1 AS "Mechanical Issue Time",
  TOff2 AS "Electrical Issue Time",
  TOff3 AS "Process Issue Time",
  TOff4 AS "Other Issue Time"
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CASE 
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'), TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
    END AS time,
    TStop
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from MIN(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS from_time,
  (extract(epoch from MAX(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS to_time,
  SUM(TStop) AS "Cycle Disabled"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CASE 
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'), TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
    END AS time,
    TWait1,
    TWait2,
    TWait3,
    TWait4,
    TWait5,
    TWait6,
    TWait7,  
    TWait8,
    TWait9 
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time AS "To Time",
  (extract(epoch from MIN(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS from_time,
  (extract(epoch from MAX(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS to_time,
  SUM(TWait1) AS "Drawer Sampling",
  SUM(TWait2) AS "Valves Maintenance",
  SUM(TWait3) AS "Hydraulic Oil Unit Maintenance",
  SUM(TWait4) AS "Hydraulic Oil Plant Maintenance",
  SUM(TWait5) AS "Blower Maintenance",
  SUM(TWait6) AS "Skip Maintenance",
  SUM(TWait7) AS "Weighed Hopper Calibration",
  SUM(TWait8) AS "Coal Weighed Tank Calibration",
  SUM(TWait9) AS "Other Maintenance"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CASE 
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'), TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
      WHEN ${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second'))
    END AS time,
    TOff1, 
    TOff2,
    TOff3,
    TOff4
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from MIN(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS from_time,
  (extract(epoch from MAX(created_at))*1000)::TEXT AS to_time,
  SUM(TOff1) AS "Mechanical Issue Time",
  SUM(TOff2) AS "Electrical Issue Time",
  SUM(TOff3) AS "Process Issue Time",
  SUM(TOff4) AS "Other Issue Time"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${__interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    LSCYpv,
    LCY
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${__interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  SUM(LSCYpv) AS "Total Limestone",
  SUM(LCY) AS "Total Lime"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    NP
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time AS time_start,
  time + (${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond') AS time_end,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  AVG(NP) AS "Nominal Production"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    AVG(NP) AS average
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    AVG(NP) AS average
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

panels.description: The value is compared to the value from the preceding period of the same duration

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    'previous' AS period,
    SUM(LCY) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'current' AS period,
    SUM(LCY) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

panels.title: Lime Produced

panels.description: Rate calculated over the entire selected period

targets.rawSql:
WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at AS time_start,
    created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second') AS time_end,
    LCY AS value
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at) 
)
SELECT
  SUM(value) / extract(epoch from (max(time_end) - min(time_start))) * 3.6 AS "Lime Rate"
FROM temp

panels.title: Lime Rate

targets.rawSql:
WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at,
    CASE 
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '1 day' 
        THEN date_bin(${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond', created_at, TIMESTAMP 'epoch')
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '7 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('day', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '21 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('week', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '70 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('month', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' < INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('quarter', created_at)
      WHEN ${interval_ms} * INTERVAL '1 millisecond' >= INTERVAL '365 days' 
        THEN date_trunc('year', created_at)
    END AS time,
    LCY, LSCYsp, LSCYpv
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
)
SELECT 
  time,
  (extract(epoch from time) * 1000)::TEXT  AS from_time,
  ((extract(epoch from time) * 1000) + ${interval_ms})::TEXT AS to_time,
  SUM(LCY) AS "Lime x Cycle",
  SUM(LSCYsp) AS "Limestone x Cycle Setpoint",
  SUM(LSCYpv) AS "Limestone x Cycle"
FROM temp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

panels.description: The value is compared to the value from the preceding period of the same duration

SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    SUM(LSCYsp) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    SUM(LSCYsp) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

panels.title: Limestone

panels.description: Rate calculated over the entire selected period

targets.rawSql:
WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at AS time_start,
    created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second') AS time_end,
    LSCYsp AS value
  FROM ${data_table}
  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
    AND $__timeFilter(created_at) 
)
SELECT
  SUM(value) / extract(epoch from (max(time_end) - min(time_start))) * 3.6 AS "Limestone Rate Setpoint"
FROM temp

targets.rawSql:
WITH temp AS (
  SELECT 
    created_at AS time_start,
    created_at + ((TCY + TStop) * INTERVAL '1 second') AS time_end,
    LSCYpv AS value

  WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}

panels.title: Limestone Rate

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    'previous_interval' AS period,
    SUM(heat_consumption_setpoint) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      -- start previous period
      (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
       - (TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000) - TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)))
      -- end previous period
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)

UNION ALL

SELECT
    'selected_interval' AS period,
    SUM(nominal_prod) AS total
FROM ${data_table}
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
  AND created_at BETWEEN
      TO_TIMESTAMP(${__from}/1000)
      AND TO_TIMESTAMP(${__to}/1000);

list.description: Select the endpoint representing the data source from which data will be retrieved.
list.label: Endpoint
list.name: endpoint
endpoint_id

list.description: Select the correct tag table associated with the chosen endpoint that contains the dashboard variables.
list.label: Tag Table
list.name: tag_table

list.definition:
SELECT process_table
FROM config.tag_tables
WHERE name = '${tag_table}'
list.description: Select the correct data table associated with the chosen endpoint that contains the dashboard data.
list.label: Table
list.name: data_table
list.query:
SELECT process_table
FROM config.tag_tables
WHERE name = '${tag_table}'

list.label: Lables
list.name: lables

list.description: compute time range for postgres in seconds
list.label: Time Range
list.name: time_range
